input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter use to handle the request.
Default value: VMwareInfrastructure

items The items XML used to update one or more items within Virtual Infrastructure Client.
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <parameters> .......... </parameters> </item> </items>

item type The item type that makes the judgement on what wrapper must be executed.
Valid values:
Update_Host_Network_Configuration Update_CPU_Configuration Update_Ethernet_Adapter_Configuration Update_Memory_Configuration Update_VM_Configuration Add_Port_Group Add_Virtual_NIC Add_Virtual_Switch Remove_Port_Group Remove_Virtual_NIC Remove_Virtual_Switch Add_CD_ROM Add_Ethernet_Adapter Add_Hard_Disk Remove_CD_ROM Remove_Ethernet_Adapter Remove_Hard_Disk Update_VM_Snapshot Extend_Vmfs_Datastore Update_Internet_Scsi_Name Update_Software_Internet_Scsi_Enabled Update_Hard_Disk_Configuration Update_CD_ROM_Configuration Update_VApp_Configuration Update_Cluster_DRS_Configuration Update_Virtual_NIC Update_Port_Group Update_Virtual_Switch Customize_VM
version The VMware Infrastructure Application version. The current supported version are v3.0, v4.0 and v5.0.

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <soap-url></soap-url> <transport></transport> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> </connection-parameters>

documentation.description: Update Items Update one or more items within Virtual Infrastructure Client.
